sen.j: 久美の浜温泉（くみのはまおんせん）は、京都府京丹後市久美浜町平田（旧久美浜町）（旧国丹後国）にある温泉。
sen.e: Kuminohama Hot Spring is a hot spring located in Hirata Kumihama-cho (former Kumihama-cho) Kyotango City Kyoto Prefecture (Tango Province under ancient administrative division).
Kuminohama Hot Spring is a hot spring located in Hirata Kumihama-cho (former Kumihama-cho) Kyotango City Kyoto Prefecture (Tango Province under ancient administrative division).
Kuminohama Hot Spring is a hot spring located in Hirata, Kumihama-cho (former Kumihama-cho), Kyotango City, Kyoto Prefecture (Tango Province under ancient administrative division).
sen.cmt: カンマを追加しました。

sen.j: 一部「久美浜温泉」との表記もあり、久美浜シーサイド温泉との誤認防止の可能性もある。
sen.e: Some describe it as "Kumihama hot spring," possibly for the purpose of not being mistaken for Kumihama Seaside Onsen Hot Spring.
Some describe it as "Kumihama hot spring," possibly for the purpose of not being mistaken for Kumihama Seaside Onsen Hot Spring.
Some describe it as 'Kumihama hot spring,' possibly for the purpose of not being mistaken for Kumihama Seaside Onsen Hot Spring.

sen.j: 場所的に離れており、温泉郷とは言いがたい。
sen.e: The two hot springs are distant from each other and can not be described collectively as a hot spring resort.
The two hot springs are distant from each other and can not be described collectively as a hot spring resort.
The two hot springs are distant from each other and can not be described collectively as a hot spring resort.

sen.j: 町内に湧く別の温泉として確執があるのかもしれない。
sen.e: They may assert themselves as different hot springs even within the same town.
Even within the same town, they are treated as separate hot springs.
It may be that, even within the same town, they wanted to be treated as separate hot springs.
sen.cmt: NC check お願いします。

sen.j: 北近畿タンゴ鉄道北近畿タンゴ鉄道宮津線丹後神野駅下車（車で5分）
sen.e: (A 5 minute drive) from Tango-Kanno Station of Kitakinki Tango Railway Miyazu Line
(A 5 minute drive) from Tango-Kanno Station of Kitakinki Tango Railway Miyazu Line
(A five minute drive) from Tango-Kanno Station of Kitakinki Tango Railway Miyazu Line
sen.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。

sen.j: 硫酸塩泉（低張性弱アルカリ性高温泉）
sen.e: Sulfate spring (hypotonic, alkalescent, and high temperature water)
Sulfate spring (hypotonic, alkalescent, and high temperature water)
Sulfate spring (hypotonic, alkalescent, and high temperature water)

sen.j: ほとんど湖をなす久美浜湾の東方、海岸からは離れた位置にあり、湯元館一軒宿である。
sen.e: East of the Kumihama Bay, which is nearly forming a lake, it is located away from the coast and there is only one inn, Yumoto-kan.
East of the Kumihama Bay, which nearly forms a lake, it is located away from the coast with only one inn, Yumoto-kan, in the area.
East of the Kumihama Bay, which nearly forms a lake, it is located away from the coast with only one inn, Yumoto-kan, in the area.

sen.j: 1996年5月2日 - 環境省告示第26号により、久美の浜温泉郷として国民保養温泉地に指定。
sen.e: On May 2, 1996, Kuminohama Hot Spring is designated as People's Recreation Spa by the Ministry of Environment Notification No. 19.
On May 2, 1996, Kuminohama Hot Spring was designated the People's Recreation Spa by the Ministry of Environment Notification No. 19.
May 2, 1996: Kuminohama Hot Spring was designated the People's Recreation Spa by the Ministry of Environment Notification No.26.
sen.cmt: 数字を修正しました。"On May 2, 1996, "→"May 2, 1996:"に変更しました。
